title: Must Read: Kaia Gerber Fronts Sarah Burton's First Givenchy Campaign, L'Oréal and Nvidia Partner to Bring Next-Gen AI to Beauty
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Wednesday. Following the debut of Sarah Burton's first collection as Givenchy's creative director in March, the British designer has released her first campaign for the brand. The Fall 2025 campaign stars Kaia Gerber and Halina Reijn in Fall ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
